attributes.action: Put pressure on Israel to disarm its Nuclear weapons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Israel is the dominant military force in the region. It has no requirement for nuclear weapons and should never have been allowed to disregard the Non Proliferation Treaty just because it is pro Western. It is hypocritical of the UK Government and the WEST in General  to demand that other countries in the region abide by the Non Proliferation Treaty and do nothing to achieve the same compliance from Israel.
